synopsis.text:
Uiba's world takes a remarkable turn when her father, determined to lift her spirits after a failed hatching attempt at their pet shop, brings home a mysterious, oversized egg. To their astonishment, the egg hatches into a lively green dinosaur who can only utter the words "Muka-Muka." Uiba, thrilled with her new companion, names him after the only sounds he can make.

The adorable yet mischievous Muka-Muka quickly becomes the center of attention in their quaint town, causing quite a stir with his playful antics and insatiable appetite. As Uiba and Muka-Muka navigate their daily adventures alongside her childhood friend Senta, older friend Hazuki, and their neighbors, they find themselves entangled in the eccentric inventions of the town's professor.

One of the professor's most astonishing inventions, a time machine, accidentally transports the Shikatani family and their friends back to prehistoric times. Here, they encounter a myriad of other dinosaurs and enchanting creatures, embarking on a series of thrilling adventures that will forever change their lives. Join Uiba and Muka-Muka as they explore this captivating world, making new friends and discovering the wonders of the past.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
